notes: Hotmaps residential data from until 2016 according to their 'D2.3 WP2 Report – Open Data Set for the EU28'. Possible future sub-division of countries will require country-level reformatting.
Hotmaps non-residential data from until 2016 according to their 'D2.3 WP2 Report – Open Data Set for the EU28'. Possible future sub-division of countries will require country-level reformatting.
